Posts.Content: I was diagnosed in June with stage IIb HER positive breast cancer.  I did not mastectomy, chemo, or radiation.  I took 3 simple natural treatments in pill form.  Cannabis, Broccoli Sprouts, and Turmeric.  Here is a couple of links to the broccoli sprouts and turmeric spice.  You will have to google 'breast cancer and cannabis'...as there is so much on that subject. This one everyone should read.  It's about cancer stem cells from the University of Michigan. http://www.cancer.med.umich.edu/research/breast_stemcells.sh This one is about Turmeric Spice (Curcumin). http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2758121/ And this one is about broccoli sprouts (Sulforaphane)http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed?term=broccoli%20sprouts%2
Posts.Title: Are there any stage IV breast cancer survivors thru alternative treatments????

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed in June with stage IIb HER positive breast cancer.  I did not mastectomy, chemo, or radiation.  I took 3 simple natural treatments in pill form.  Cannabis, Broccoli Sprouts, and Turmeric.  Here is a couple of links to the broccoli sprouts and turmeric spice.  You will have to google 'breast cancer and cannabis'...as there is so much on that subject. This one everyone should read.  It's about cancer stem cells from the University of Michigan. http://www.cancer.med.umich.edu/research/breast_stemcells.sh This one is about Turmeric Spice (Curcumin). http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2758121/ And this one is about broccoli sprouts (Sulforaphane)http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed?term=broccoli%20sprouts%2
Posts.Title: Are there any stage IV breast cancer survivors thru alternative treatments????

Posts.Content: Hi everyone!  I just received wonderful news from oncologist!  My breast cancer is gone and they can't find any cancer cells in my body!!  I couldn't find an alternative treatment feed on here and didn't know if it is okay to post it here.  I did not do the mastecomy, chemotherapy, and radiation like she wanted me to.  I used Raw Cannabis, Broccoli Sprouts, and Turmeric Spice.  That is all.  I never had a bad day and never missed a day of work.  I had stage IIb...HER+++ breast cancer.  I will take a maintenace dose the rest of my life.  Did you every hear of breast cancer stem cells?  If you google 'stem cells in breast cancer university of michigan' you can read about the research they did on it.    God Bless, Joey
Posts.Title: I got an early Christmas present!
